title: Bug 76055Some Pointcut PatternNodes are missing getters to traverse syntax tree
description: Bug 76055Some Pointcut PatternNodes are missing getters to traverse syntax tree
OB: In order to find out which other pointcuts are referenced by a pointcut definitioni need to access the private members of the CflowPointcut, IfPointcut andNotPointcut PatternNodes found in the weaver module.Unlike the OrPointcut and AndPointcut classes, they are missing the appropriategetter methods.
